channel.title: Anyone Have Compiling Error Look Here
channel.description:
RIght Click On Your CompIler And Click Edit
Then Add this
first delete everything you have in there
@echo off COLOR 08 title (yourserversname) server "c:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe"-cp.*.java "c:Program FilesJavaJdk1.5.0_07in/java.exe"server pause
Rep Me If You LIke Lol
Also Post If It Helped You[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 04:49:43 PM[/size][hr]PM IF You Need More Help

item.title: Anyone Have Compiling Error Look Here
item.dc:creator: @Kite Kite
item.description:
@Kite wrote:

For some reason, that guys path has no '/'s and some strange square thing instead of ‘b’, so here is the working on (if you installed Java to the automatic place):


"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server

Just replace the ‘9’ with your update version!

-Kite-

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone Have Compiling Error Look Here

item.title: Anyone Have Compiling Error Look Here
item.dc:creator: @Kite Kite
item.description:
@Kite wrote:

If you downloaded Update 9, change it to this:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server

-Kite-

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Have Compiling Error Look Here
item.dc:creator: @x0_i_own_x0 x0 i own x0
item.description:
@x0_i_own_x0 wrote:

RIght Click On Your CompIler And Click Edit

Then Add this

first delete everything you have in there

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (yourserversname) server
“c:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe”-cp.*.java
"c:Program FilesJavaJdk1.5.0_07in/java.exe"server
pause
